context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse, search, and view product details, and add products to their cart within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and purchase products easily
description: This use case enables customers to browse products by category, search for products by keyword, view product details, and add products to their cart for purchase.
triggering_event: Customer initiates browsing or searching for products.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the e-commerce system.
postconditions: Customer has successfully browsed products, viewed details, and added products to the cart.
assumptions: The customer has an active account and is familiar with the e-commerce platform.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System shows detailed information about the selected product.
4. Customer adds products to cart → System updates the cart with the selected products.
